channel.title: Spirit shields are invisble
channel.description: I added spirit sheilds to client (edgeville pk base) on my invy there invisble but i can right click them and it will show all options and i can wear it. When i wear it i can see it but on my equipment it shows it invisble how do i fix this.

item.title: Spirit shields are invisble
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Did you add the drop/inv model(s)?
If not, do that.

Are the ints correct? (Did you make changes to working ones?)

CUSTOM ITEMS HELP GOES TO MODEL REQUESTS/HELP SECTION.

Model Requests/Help

Read full topic

item.title: Spirit shields are invisble

item.description:
